name: NSUserInterfaceItemSearching
desc: A set of methods an app can implement to provide Spotlight for Help for its own custom help data.

items.name: func localizedTitles(forItem: Any) -> [String]
items.desc: Returns an array of localized strings that will form the help menu item.

items.name: func showAllHelpTopics(forSearch: String)
items.desc: If this method is implemented, a "Show All Help Topics" item will appear in the menu and this method is called when the user selects it.

items.name: func searchForItems(withSearch: String, resultLimit: Int, matchedItemHandler: ([Any]) -> Void)
items.desc: Search for the specified items, with the result limit.

items.name: func performAction(forItem: Any)
items.desc: Invoked when the user selects a search result in Help menu.
